description:
*0.1.2* Updated to enable touchpad full screen and navigation,*0.1.1* Preferences and last data entered is automatically saved ready for next use,*0.1.0* Initial version, Do you ever travel further to a cheaper fuel station to fill up? Is the trip worth while? This app is for you, it will tell you if your trip is worth while and how much you could save. Set the preferences to the options you require, Vehicle Fuel Economy Units:- mpg(UK), mpg(US) & L/100km. Fuel Purchase Units:- gal(UK), gal(US) & Litres. Distance Units:- Miles & km. Then fill in the 4 yellow boxes of:- Vehicle Economy, Local Fuel Price, Distance to Other Fuel Source & Other Fuel Source Price. And the app will tell you:- Saving in your specified Fuel Units & 
Total Round Trip Cost. It will also tell you how much you need to spend and fill up with to make it worth while.
